node.title: Shocking video shows dog being pushed off Gisborne bridge, police investigating
node.description: "Poor dog deserves a better owner than some asshole who'll push it off a bridge."
node.content: ["Warning: The video above may disturb some people.", "Police are investigating an incident in Gisborne where a person was seen pushing a dog off a bridge into the water below.\n", "The incident, captured on a video posted on Reddit, shows a group of people standing on the bridge. One person then picks up the dog to put it near the edge of the bridge before pushing it off.", "A Reddit user said they saw the group arrive with the dog.", "\"This makes me upset to see. Poor dog deserves a better owner than some asshole who'll push it off a bridge for laughs,\" one Reddit user wrote.", "\"If anyone knows this person, can you tell them some random on the internet says, 'f**k you,' said another.", "A police spokeswoman confirmed to Newshub the video has been sent to them and they are investigating.", "SPCA and Gisborne District Council have been contacted for comment."]
